tool_description: GraphQL API which returns the daily covid data which is pulled from the NCDC WEBSITE
name: Nigeria COVID
title: Nigeria COVID

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigeria-covid.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigeria-covid.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nigeria-covid.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigeria-covid.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
